explains: n. 协调，配合；身体的协调性；配位；同一等级（或类别）
wordGroup: internal coordination 内部协调；对内协调

sentences.en: Learning to drive is all a matter of coordination.
Intoxication interferes with speech and coordination.
sentences.cn: 醉酒影响言语能力和协调性。

sentences.en: You need good hand-eye coordination to play ball games.
sentences.cn: 玩球类游戏，手和眼的动作要协调好。
